name: OR_LNLG_ANESTF_TMS
description: This table contains the Anesthesia Staff Times information for the Surgical Log (ORL).

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Line (ORM) record

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The Line Count for a particular Anesthesia staff member. There may be multiple staff assigned to the case.

columns.name: ANES_STAFF_ST_DOCU_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the EMP user who documented this anesthesia staff member's start time.

columns.name: ANES_STAFF_ST_DOCU_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: ANES_STAFF_ET_DOCU_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the EMP user who documented this anesthesia staff member's end time.

columns.name: ANES_STAFF_ET_DOCU_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: AN_STAFF_TIME_SOURCE_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The source and status of the start and end time.
